thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com
thread.title: Samantha Kargula
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Samantha Kargula

author: Samantha Kargula
title: Samantha Kargula
text: Bought a mattress three months ago, ended up being to firm. Went back and exchanged it no problems, Gardner White pick the mattress up and delivered the new one. Very satisfied! Just be aware that there is a notable fee for the exchange.
